description: Company OverviewDollar General Corporation has been delivering value to shoppers for more than 80 years. Dollar General helps shoppers Save time. Save money. Every day.® by offering products that are frequently used and replenished, such as food, snacks, health and beauty aids, cleaning supplies, basic apparel, housewares and seasonal items at everyday low prices in convenient neighborhood locations. Learn more about Dollar General at www.dollargeneral.com/about-us.html.Job DetailsGeneral Summary:The Senior Media Account Executive, DG Media Network is responsible for stewarding media partnerships with DG suppliers spanning Consumer Packaged Goods, electronics, and beauty partners, proactively bringing forward insights-based media opportunities that will help their clients meet DG shoppers along the path to purchase via the DGMN’s portfolio of solutions. The role will work to identify client needs, collaborating with internal counterparts, including media planners, insights/data science to design media plans that align DGMN media tactics to client objectives. From there, they ensure a seamless hand off to our media buying team to ensure campaigns are delivered with excellence. This role is accountable to highlight new partnerships and evolving solutions, while delivering superior client satisfaction.The Senior Account Executive role derives energy from building and growing partnerships in the near and long term. They are proactive in identifying opportunity, plan for success, partner seamlessly with a network of internal support functions, and can manage an accurate sales pipeline. They are fluent in shopper data and able to translate insights and measurement results into opportunities for media activation. The right candidate is a self-starter with a growth mindset, recognizing that they are ultimately accountable for the results they deliver.Dollar General Media Network (DGMN) Overview: DGMN helps brands connect to DG shoppers along their path to purchase through a portfolio of self-service and managed service digital tactics including Programmatic Display, Video, CTV, Digital out of Home, Audio, Social, O&O, onsite media and more. We use our first party data to bring to bear best in class media plans that will resonate with our customers and fulfill our partners’ KPIs. DGMN real time reporting and closed loop measurement allows us to assess performance and optimize.Duties & Responsibilities:Owning a book of business and driving the selling cycle with a portfolio of CPG clients including working with different groups that own advertising and marketing budgets (Shopper Marketing, Ecomm teams, Shopper Agencies, National Agencies of Record, Digital Teams)Fostering trusted client relationshipsIdentifying opportunity using shopper insights and bringing forward media recommendations leveraging the DGMN portfolio of tactics to achieve the CPG objectivesOverseeing the development of proposals, terms, deliverables and ensuring all campaigns meet all deadlines throughout the sales to market execution cycleEnsuring proper set up and intake of pipeline in Salesforce and right inputs collected to enable media buyers and DGMN’s creative studioCollaborating internally with a network of support functions including Product, Operations, Media Buyers, Media Planners, Insights, and Data Science to deliver the best of DGMN to our clientsKnowledge, Skills & Abilities:Experience in consultative selling, with proven ability to deliver sales resultsExperience engaging with retailers and CPG clients across marketing verticals, including Ecomm, Trade, Shopper Marketing and Digital MediaComfort interpreting closed-loop media measurement tying marketing to sales using retail dataProven client leadership skills; ability to develop relationships and influenceAnalytical acumen to make decisions; understand and optimize media campaignsStrong interpersonal skills and ability to internally partner on behalf of the clientEffective and proactive project management skillsAbility to articulate and translate client objectives to build a media planStrong understanding of digital and social platforms as well as their use in marketingExcellent communication, presentation and interpersonal skillsDemonstrated ability to share actionable recommendations in a concise and persuasive mannerQualificationsWork Experience &/or Education:Bachelors' degree B.A. / B.S or equivalent work experience.4+ Digital media and advertising experienceTravel is encouraged to advance client relationships_#Mogul
